extendedInfo.description: TCM Clinic Aid is a reference guide for practitioners and students of Traditional Chinese Medicine (Acupuncturist and Herbalist). It should not be used to diagnose ailments or diseases. Diagnosis should be done by a licensed Acupuncturist and Herbalist.KEY FEATURES:Search our relational database for:1. Acupuncture and Auricular points,- Includes images of Acupuncture points.- Includes Chinese characters and pinyin with tonemarks for all Acupuncture points.- Includes images of Auricular points.2. Individual Herbs and Herbal Formulas,- Includes images of individual herbs.- Includes Chinese characters and pinyin with tonemarks for all Herbs and Herbal Formulas.3. Diagnosis Etiologies,4. Search by symptoms and indications.5. You can also search for a specific diagnosis, formulas, herbs, and points using the following:a. Diagnosis etiologies searched by pathology name, i.e., 'Liver Yang Rising', suggested points, or suggested formulas,b. Formula names searched by pinyin, english name, ingredients, western uses (western ailments it can treat),c. Herb names searched by pinyin, english or botanical (latin),d. Points searched by common name, i.e., 'LI4'.Browse or "drill down" through 1600+ points, herbs, formulas and diagnosis etiology.User modification/editing of auricular, diagnosis, herbs, formulas and points.The following components are also included:1. Master Tung Points.2. Wrist/Ankle Acupuncture.3. Quiz Yourself.4. Pulse Diagnosis.

reviews.title: Best app In TCM Field!
reviews.comment: The first time I\'ve ever rated an application... This is the best app I\'ve seen for Tradditional Chinese Medicine.. it updates with valid information. It functions properly. I feel connected to the TCM community. I recommend this app for all Acupuncturists and Traditional Chinese Medicine Practitioners.   Great job!  May you receive more business prosperity!
reviews.author: Anwar Ibrahim

reviews.title: Best tcm app hands down
reviews.comment: I wish this was out when I was in school. it\'s worth the $15.
reviews.author: Iris LeFleur

reviews.title: Images not available
reviews.comment: Hi, I\'d just like to start by saying this is a great app and I use it all the time. The only problem I am having is that I deleted all the images and they aren\'t showing on a reinstall. I had a look through comments and can\'t see a solution. Please help, thanks Niall. (Problem Resolved- thanks again)
reviews.author: Niall Carroll

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: The best in the mkt.
reviews.author: rakesh venkatagiri

reviews.title: Data backup issue
reviews.comment: When WLAN is enabled at the very end of Settings, the address and the label \"Address\"are overlaid on the same line so the first characters of the address are not readable.  Also, would love to see scalp points added!
reviews.author: Doraine Raichart

reviews.title: Fantastic app
reviews.comment: Has been a great help. Recommend it to anybody doing TCM
reviews.author: Anthony Liddell

reviews.title: New update please
reviews.comment: More specified picture points, better easy-to-use search, better linking to formulas in the specificated point location.  I\'ve bought this App time a go, and there\'s some improvements but nothing mayor... c\'mon it\'s time now... Sincerely A costumer
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Photos are now gone w/update
reviews.comment: I really like this app... It\'s really handy and modifyable so you can make additions as you like to include your own notes. (When updating, make sure you phones display stays awake for the new image files to completely load.)
reviews.author: Liane Goldberg

reviews.title: Photos all back now! Thsnks
reviews.comment: Post update Ive lost all my photos of the points. Did a remove snd reinstall of software but still no photos! Now fixed
reviews.author: Steve Connolly

reviews.title: photos are gone
reviews.comment: great app but pics are gone
reviews.author: Young Kang

reviews.title: Great App - Amazing Customer Support!
reviews.comment: It\'s unbelievable how versatile this app is. I\'ve run into a few glitches, being on Android, and the tech support has been amazing. The developer emailed back & forth with me at almost texting speed - and he even puts his phone number on his website if you can\'t reach him by email. He really cares about doing things right.  He\'s an acupuncturist, himself, and his care & detail in designing this app shows. Unbelievable.
reviews.author: Janice Campbell M.Ac., L.Ac., ADS

reviews.title: Very good, could do with some improvement
reviews.comment: I Need to be able to edit point names so they\'re consistent with the spelling we use at university. Also good to have read out details for learning.
reviews.author: mark palmos

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I love this app, it\'s so handy. The only improvement I would make on it would be to enable a tap to view function on the points. So when advising on points for a certain pattern, we would be able to click straight through to a point we are unsure of. Thanks for all the effort you have put into this app.
reviews.author: J Kenyon

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app for students. Constant updates makes it better. IF you could include preparation notes on herbs and formulas that would be great! formulas like shou tai wan, which is ground and made into a pill by using E jiao in water as the binding agent. This information would be great for those who use the app while mixing herbs in a dispensary. Thank you for the great app so far though!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No pics!
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t show me the image pics except auricular points ! Pls refund...
reviews.author: Kyung Hee Kim

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: I use it daily as an acupuncture student!
reviews.author: Jason Calva

reviews.title: App very good
reviews.comment: Great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: My go to study aid for tcm. Thanks to the developers! I can study for point location and theory, diagnosis, and herbs all in one place. I love this app!
reviews.author: Rhonda Louise

reviews.title: Very useful for students
reviews.comment: Although there are some errors in spelling and a few bugs in the various components, this is a useful tool and a great study aid. It didn\'t get 5 stars because it doesn\'t have scalp and/or facial.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Still bugs
reviews.comment: Good program but not enough. Basic TCM knowledgement
reviews.author: A Google User
